page.title: 13EDUCATION SCHOOL SUBJECTS
page.content: I think one of the important things about Farley Hill is the schools, because they are for learning and to help get jobs easier. Some hate school some think they are missing fun at home. The subjects at Rotheram High include Maths and English which are very important. Geography and History are sometimes taught separately and sometimes together as Humanities. For children from Junior schools some subjects are new eg.Science which has laboratories. Craft also has special rooms woodwork is taught as well as sewing. Cooking is a favourite with many Art another. Many find French interesting and look to the time when they visit France and are not scared to speak. RE and Social Education are taught and Pastoral time is spent with the form teacher. Computer Studies is new, PE and games are for health.
